data.prayer: Father, encourage the 217 believers in Kandy to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kandy, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Kandy, Sri Lanka to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 192 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kandy, Sri Lanka.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, remind your church in Kandy, Sri Lanka that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,362,742, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Burmese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Burmese people.
Jesus, please give your people in Kandy, Sri Lanka a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 217 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kandy, Sri Lanka has a population of 2,558,700.

We estimate Kandy has 217 people who might know Jesus, 195,741 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,362,742 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11,791 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Kandy, Sri Lanka to the gospel today.

location.name: Kandy
